segments.text: I observe this kitchen scene with a strange sense of unease.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water steadily flowing from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A wide sheet of water pours over the front of the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am genuinely surprised she hasn't noticed the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is practically submerged in the water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so oblivious to such an immediate hazard?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear she might slip and injure herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The continuous stream of water seems relentless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will draw her attention to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But they seem busy with their own escapade.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't believe her expression remains so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR
